description: This file defines the Express router for handling protocol-related API endpoints, including retrieving, configuring, and deleting protocol configurations for devices. It includes routes for GET, POST, and DELETE HTTP methods, uses middleware for authentication and authorization, and interacts with a database to manage device protocol data.

methods.name: GET /api/protocols/:deviceId
methods.description: Retrieves all protocol configurations for a specific device by deviceId.

methods.name: POST /api/protocols/:deviceId/:protocolType
methods.description: Creates or updates the protocol configuration for a device with specified protocol type, including validation and conflict handling.

methods.name: DELETE /api/protocols/:deviceId/:protocolType
methods.description: Deletes a specific protocol configuration for a device.
